entry.title: 3M Scotch-Brite SB13800 - Scotch-Brite 7000120969
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Stars - Non-woven
Price: 2.59

[shortdesc]

Scotch-Brite Star, 1-1/2 in A VFN LS, 25 per inner 100 per case

  • The Scotch-Brite™ Star helps blend, deburr, and finish the hard-to-reach internal diameters of things like metal tubes and piping
  • This star cuts fast and continually self-sharpens while providing consistent pressure for cleaning or finishing in hard-to-reach places.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Line Scotch-Brite
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Stars - Non-woven

    Extra Product Information

  • Scotch-Brite™ Star features a non-woven aluminum oxide mineral blend abrasive and are available in a variety of grades
  • The non-woven technology ensures the star's spindles are spongy and flexible so they easily conform to the insides of pipes or tubes to

    • Product Information

  • Spring-like action of spindles permits abrasive to bend easily and fit inside hard-to-reach areas
  • May be used with 3M mandrel 944 for easy fastening and attachment to abrasive tools
  • Available in coarse (CRS) and very fine (VFN) grades, so desired finish is achievable
  • Up to 50 or 100 stars per case to help minimize replacement orders
  • Open web is load resistant, prolonging abrasive service life
    		•

entry.title: Merit 84125 - 1-1/2 Inch X 1/2 Inch X 1/4 Inch - 20 Eyelet Hole 80 Grit Aluminum Oxide Square Pad 08834184125
entry.summary:
Vendor: Merit
Type: Square
Price: 4.66

[shortdesc]
  • Square pads are used on high speed pneumatic tools for quick grinding and blending of channels, fillets, corners or spotting flat surfaces
  • The corners wear down consistently exposing fresh abrasives.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Merit
    Grit 80
    Product Type Square
    Size 1 1/2 Inch
    Thickness 1/2 Inch

    Product Information

  • Quality aluminum oxide abrasive grain for versatile
  • ideal for deburring, chamfering, and polishing most radii, holes, recesses, and cylinder walls
  • X-wt
  • cotton cloth and resin bond for excellent grain retention and life
  • Standard quick-change eyelet for easy mounting to quick-change mandrel for fast, easy mounting and removal
  • Resin bond system for good grain retention and life
    		•

entry.title: Merit 84195 - 1 Inch X 8 Ply X 3mm - 48 Eyelet Hole 100 Grit Aluminum Oxide Cross Pad 08834184195
entry.summary:
Vendor: Merit
Type: Cross
Price: 2.11

[shortdesc]
  • Cross pads are all used on high speed pneumatic tools for deburring, blending, cleaning, and polishing applications
  • They are designed for applications in small, tight, hard-to-access locations on parts that are being finished
  • Cross pad offer the advantage of seeing through to the contact area and are more flexible than square pads.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Merit
    Eyelet 3mm - 48
    Grit 100

    Size 1 Inch
